name: 5 Festive Faces
description:
Five Festive Faces is a logic-based puzzle game.

 

5 Faces are removed from the image and placed below the line.

Place them back in their right places above the line.

 

Look for a pattern in the faces - the pattern can be anything, a diagonal line, a picture, a horizontal line, a block etc.  There can also be more than one pattern, for example, a pattern on the top part and a different pattern on the bottom part.

 

If you struggle to see any pattern, press restart, it will give you the same puzzle but with different faces removed.

 

There are 50 puzzles and 5 different faces.   Each time you play it will allocate a random puzzle and a random face.  However, the puzzles won't repeat until you finish all of them (or lose all your lives).
